full_summary:
### Cleaning of the Pilot Plant and Food Processing Equipment
**Tender Identification Number: 01B46-23-175**

The Agricultural and Agri-Food Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the cleaning of the pilot plant and food processing equipment at the Research and Development Centre located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec.

**Summary**

The work will involve cleaning of equipment, floors, walls, ceilings, and other sanitation and washing requests in the pilot plant facilities. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, all surfaces, drainage systems, and sanitary equipment. The services will be carried out in accordance with relevant regulations and standards.

**Delivery Address**

The works will take place at the Research and Development Centre (RDC) located at 3600 Casavant Blvd. West, in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec.

**Optional Site Visit**

It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative visits the work site to familiarize themselves with the facilities and equipment. The site visit will take place on April 5, 2024, at the Research and Development Centre and begin at 8:30 AM local time.

**Key Information**

*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 27, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2025

**Award Criteria**

The award will be made based on the lowest price bid. All bidders must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the bidding documents.

**Supporting Documents**

The detailed bid package can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website, with the corresponding bid form and bidder's package available at [<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32459/q-r-1-q-a-1-2023-175.pdf>](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32459/q-r-1-q-a-1-2023-175.pdf).
